game.title: Rage in the Jungle
game.objective: Kill 10 T-Rexes and collect their fangs.
game.description: Deep in the heart of the jungle, a group of ferocious T-Rexes have been terrorizing the local inhabitants. The villagers are too afraid to take them on alone, so they need a brave adventurer like you to put an end to this chaos.
game.reward: 1000 Gold Coins and the title "T-Rex Hunter".

task.objective: Finding a map that leads to the T-Rexes' lair.
task.description: Find an old, abandoned temple in the jungle and search for any clues or maps that might lead you to the T-Rexes' lair. Be careful not to get lost or caught by any of the local wildlife.

task.objective: Killing a T-Rex and collecting its fang.
task.description: Once you have the map, head to the location marked on it and find a nearby clearing where the T-Rexes are usually found. Be prepared for a fierce battle! After defeating one of them, take out its fang as proof of your victory.
